question.text: Do you now use smokeless tobacco products...

extension.valueString: ¿Alguna vez en su vida consumió al menos una bebida alcohólica de cualquier tipo, sin contar pequeñas probadas? (Con "bebida" nos referimos a una lata o botella de cerveza, una copa de vino o refrescos de vino, un trago (shot) de licor o una bebida mezclada con licor).

question.text: In your entire life, have you had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol, not counting small tastes or sips? (By a “drink,” we mean a can or bottle of beer, a glass of wine or a wine cooler, a shot of liquor, or a mixed drink with liquor in it.)

group.text: This module asks about personal habits that may affect your health, like smoking, drinking alcohol, or using any drugs.
group.title: lifestyle
